shortdesc.ph: Sets an SDK preset audio effect.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.p: Call this method to set an SDK preset audio effect for the local user who sends an audio stream. This audio effect does not change the gender characteristics of the original voice. After setting an audio effect, all users in the channel can hear the effect.
You can set different audio effects for different scenarios. See Set the Voice Beautifier and Audio Effects.
To get better vocal effects, Agora recommends that you set scenario to (3) before calling this method.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter in to (1) or (6), or the method will not take effect.
This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music.
If you call this method and set an enumeration other than or, do not call again, otherwise the effect set by this method will be overwritten.
After calling this method, Agora recommends not calling the following methods, because they can override \ref IRtcEngine::setVoiceBeautifierPreset "setVoiceBeautifierPreset":

plentry.pd: The options for SDK preset audio effects.
